1538110.name: Lichenvale Demo
1538110.description:
There are dreams and there are nightmares. There is death and there are swords and spells to stove it off. What will you do when dark specters come for you tonight? Players find themselves in the role of a young woman who is being trapped in her own nightmares. Can you find your way through the labyrinths of darkness, or will you be trapped forever?



Inspired by 90's hits like Hexen and Quake with a bit of modern philosophy of Doom: Eternal, Lichenvale is a first person hack and slash offering fast-paced melee action mixed with the tactical use of spells and dashing around your enemies. Battle your way through diverse and progressively more capable and difficult enemies and bosses in order to escape from dark and depressive medieval nightmare. Successfully slashing your way out with your trusty longsword will fuel an array of destructive and defensive spells that you can unleash and wreak havoc on your enemies all while dashing around of harms way.
1538110.supported_languages: 英语, 塞尔维亚语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 加泰罗尼亚语
